item.title: Olariu add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "To think is easy. To act is hard. But the hardest thing in the world is to act in accordance with your thinking." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Olariu add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Enjoy when you can, and endure when you must." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Olariu add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Know thyself? If I knew myself, I'd run away." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Olariu add a quote by Nicolae Steinhardt
item.description: "Situatia de srestin e tot una cu statutul de aristocrat. De ce?Pentru ca isi are temeiul in cele mai ,senoriale' insusiri:libertatea si increderea. Ce este nobilul si feudalul?Mai presus de toate orice om liber. Ce inseamna credinta?Incredere in Domnul, desi lumea e rea, in ciuda nedreptatii, in pofida josniciei, cu toate ca de pretutindeni nu vin decat semnale negative." -- Nicolae Steinhardt
